protocol.description: A list of network protocol services that extension provides.

description: Use the browser.protocol API to register, custom protocol service.

types.description: Protocol service provided by an extension.

name.description: A user-readable title string for this protocol. It will be displayed to the user in interface objects as needed.

scheme.description: The protocol scheme for this protocol, specified as a string. For example, you can register to handle SMS text message links by registering to handle the "sms" scheme.

types.description: Protocol handler function used in registration. It is invoked with a corresponding Request each time resource from this protocol is loaded.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: Request instance corresponding to the resource being loaded.

returns.description: Response instance corresponding to the passed request

scheme.description: The protocol scheme for this registration.

unregister.description: Unregisters protocol and returns a promise resolved on completion.

events.name: onRequest
events.description: Fired with a corresponding Request each time a resource from this protocol is loaded.

request.description: Request instance corresponding to the resource being loaded.

extraParameters.name: scheme
extraParameters.description: The protocol scheme for this listener.

response.description: Response instance corresponding to the passed request
